description: The 4 years bachelor in Interactive Communication in Universitat Autònoma de Barcelona immerses you in the world of new technologies and digital communication. This program develops the skills needed to create interactive and exciting content in different areas, such as web and mobile applications, interfaces, videogames and augmented reality.
introduction: Program that develops skills needed to create interactive content through new technologies and digital content.
achievements: Erasmus program of 6 months in Florence

description: The Front-End Developer course offered by Meta, on the Coursera educational platform, covers the knowledge needed for a front-end web developer and takes approximately 7 months to complete. It consists of a total of 9 courses designed to cover the knowledge of web programming languages par excellence, with special emphasis on React and the creation of attractive user-centered interfaces.
introduction: A total of 9 courses that covers the programming and design knowledge needed for a front-end web developer
achievements: Average grade of the 9 courses of 9.05 out of 10

description: The 2 years Audiovisual High School at the Frederic Mistral - Tècnic Eulàlia school has allowed me to cultivate my passion for multiple creative fields that allowed me to appreciate, analyze and create immersive audiovisual content. Giving me that perspective that requires great attention to detail, narrative, artistic sensibility and a deep understanding of visual communication.
introduction: Studies on multiple creative fields that allows me to create and analyze audiovisual content.
achievements: Selected together with 14 people, out of 270 students at the school, to receive a public recognition assessing both my values and my academic results
highlight: public recognition assessing both my values and my academic results
